name: TFM GPU Container
postCreateCommand: cd /workspace && pip install --no-deps -e . && python -m ipykernel install --user --name educational_ai_analytics --display-name "Python (TFM Analytics)" && (SERVER_DIR="$HOME/.antigravity-server/bin" && mkdir -p "$SERVER_DIR" && for dir in "$SERVER_DIR"/*-*; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then commit="${dir##*-}"; [ ! -e "$SERVER_DIR/$commit" ] && ln -s "$dir" "$SERVER_DIR/$commit"; fi; done) 2>/dev/null || true
